name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Teach Me How to DJ - DJing 101
long_desc: This course intends to provide an introductory path into the world of modern-day DJing, Electronic Dance Music (EDM) and Controllerism. Students will learn the basics of how to use simple DJ software, understand the power of song selection, simple song mixing and production, and tips for performing in front of a live audience.  Students will be required to bring a laptop (PC or MAC) and headphones to class. Suggested, free course software will be available for download and also on cluster computers.
